author: cmpilato
msg: Fix an ancient bug which caused mod_dav_svn to a) transmit some opaque
URLs with double slashes, and b) send baseline collection urls that
because the former understands path semantics.

author: hwright
msg: Merge r29858, r29859 and r29876 from trunk:
Fix some bugs related to merges from foreign repositories,
including bogus attempts at recording mergeinfo, and the creation of
r29859 isn't required, but minimizes the diff against trunk.

author: hwright
msg: Remove the confusing conflict resolution support from 'svn
resolved' (which still claimed it didn't do exactly that),
and add instead a new 'svn resolve' subcommand.  'svn resolved'
is now deprecated in favor of 'svn resolve --accept working'.

author: hwright
msg: Tweak the svn_client_mergeinfo_get_merged() API to not claim to
populate an svn_mergeinfo_t * structure, since it uses full URLs
instead of absolute repository filesystem paths in that hash.
If we don't backport this, we'll need to rev the API on trunk

author: hwright
msg: Follow-up to r30062: Rename resolved2 to resolve in Perl bindings.
